common.name: Benjamín Fernández
common.quote: I am a software engineer with a passion for creating innovative solutions that enhance user experiences and streamline processes. I thrive in collaborative environments and am always eager to learn new technologies.

eskuad.description: Eskuad is a software platform designed to help businesses manage their field operations more efficiently.
eskuad.descriptionPoint1: Developed and maintained features on Eskuad’s web platform using Vue.js, Node.js, and MongoDB. Notably implemented an Excel-like interactive interface for report generation with XLSX export and advanced tools for form creation and management.
eskuad.descriptionPoint2: Optimized processes and improved platform performance through code refactoring and identification of bottle-necks.
eskuad.descriptionPoint3: Participated in the recruitment process by conducting technical interviews and evaluating candidates for development roles.

dosier.description: Dosier is a web platform that allows users to create, manage, and share digital documents.
dosier.descriptionPoint1: Developed a web platform for document management in municipalities, enhancing administration, traceability, and control of documents using Vue.js, Node.js, and Sequelize.
dosier.descriptionPoint2: Implemented key features such as digital signatures, task assignment for approval, document forwarding, file attachments, and comment threads.
dosier.descriptionPoint3: Collaborated with the design team to create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs using Figma.

buses.description: Buses is a web platform designed to manage and track the schedules of a bus line operating in Concepción.
buses.descriptionPoint1: Developed a web platform for centralized scheduling and optimization of a bus line’s timetable using React and Django.
buses.descriptionPoint2: Designed and implemented an intuitive interface for schedule management, allowing the generation of new monthly schedules.
buses.descriptionPoint3: Collaborated with the design team to create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs using Figma.

udec.description: OfiVirtualfi is a web platform designed to optimize the functionality of the Faculty of Engineering’s Academic Secretariat.
udec.descriptionPoint1: Developed a web platform to optimize the functionality of the Faculty of Engineering’s Academic Secretariat. Integrated key tools including student request management, schedule and announcement visualization, request status tracking, and FAQ consultations.

pokedex.description: Pokedex is a web application that allows users to explore and manage Pokémon data.
pokedex.descriptionPoint1: Developed a web application using Vue and Node.js to provide an interactive platform for Pokémon enthusiasts to view and manage Pokémon data.
